title: team assist score directly correlates with winning games
body:
It's scary how few people understand this simple fact, assists are a direct indicator of teamwork, and teamwork wins games. 

I see this pattern over and over (this one goes out to my fellow bronzies)  It's not hard to understand, if you help noone, if you solo the whole game, if you walk away from your team-mates when they need help, you will lose your games.

replies.body: It could also be argued that teams in a winning position get more assists by default. They may not necessarily have many assists when they get to mid game 10k gold ahead after individually smashing their respective lanes...
This game was 39-26 so couldn't it be that there were just more kills to be involved in once they were winning?

Or the actual reality, the team with more feeders loses.

10, 10 and 9 is more then 10.
